properties.title: IGA
properties.description: They might be out of greens if we get there closer to New Year's Day. They don't have any good flour, so bring some with.

properties.title: IGA
properties.description: Call ahead if we're going to be late and they'll leave a key.

properties.title: IGA
properties.description: This place was good, very vegan-friendly, and expensive. $9 drinks, $15ish for entrees.

properties.title: IGA
properties.description: Stef recommended Huc-a-poos once on the way in and maybe one more time. We are usually hungry and ready to move around that first day, so that's good. We can always wait to end up in that general area before we eat there, too. For coffee, be sure to get there before the other shops open up. That's when the line gets long.

properties.title: IGA
properties.description: I always forget that there is this route through the neighborhoods. It's much more pleasant than the main road!

properties.title: IGA
properties.description: This icecream place, Savannah Praline Company, is much better than the one across the street that sometimes put Pinesol in the soap dispensers :|.

properties.title: 2022 Tybee New Year
properties.description:
2021-12-27: Traveled with Ben and Stef to Tybrisa.
2021-12-28: Rented bikes at Fat Tire Bikes, rode to Huc-a-poo's for lunch, rode to theater to pick up shirts, other stuff, Matt and Whit showed up, tacos for dinner.
